data.Name: Lil Revive
data.Bio: Lil Revive, or more commonly known as Josh A, is a rapper and a producer, but also makes songs in other genres. he frequently collaborates with artists such as Jake Hill and his best friend Darko, also known as Foti. Josh A has stated in "PSA (Skit)" that Lil Revive is "like a passion project" of his, implying that the entire "Lil Revive" catalog of music is just a side project. On September 5, 2018, Josh would release his debut mixtape under the Lil Revive name, Graveyard. Read more on Last.fm
